page.title: 09MY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Shincliffe C.E.primary school. The building was formally opened on July 3rd 1969. The school caters for people from Shincliffe village and High Shincliffe. The school has a staff of 17 people, 7 of whom are teachers including the headmaster. The school is a single storey building,built with metal, wood, pastic, concrete,plaster, and glass. The school has one hall, a library, 7 classrooms, 1 kitchen, 2 toilet blocks, a staff room and two offices. The hall is used for drama, P.E., morning assembly, school lunch, and serves as a coomunity hall several evenings each week. The school also has a large field, an attractive garden, and two playgrounds. (Laura Davis (10))
